titles: The true lovers ghost. False men do often prove unkind to those that would to them be true; then carefully my story mind, the like before you never knew. To the tune of, Tender hearts of London-city.
publisher: Printed for, J. Deacon, at the Angel in Guilt-spur-street, without Newgate.,
notes: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library and the British Library.
keywords: Broadsides --  England --  London --  Early works to 1800.
Truthfulness and falsehood --  Early works to 1800.
